meanings.definition: The act of covering a surface with slabs or slabs of material.
meanings.sent1: The workers completed the slabbings on the patio with precision.
meanings.sent2: The slabbings of marble on the kitchen countertop looked elegant.
meanings.sent3: The slabbings on the sidewalk made it look like a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like slabbings, piecing together ideas seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The slabbings of colorful tiles on the wall brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: A layer or coating of slabs on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The slabbings of snow on the roof were slowly melting in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The slabbings of paint on the fence needed a fresh coat.
meanings.sent3: The slabbings of cheese on the pizza were melting and gooey.
meanings.sent4: The slabbings of clouds in the sky created a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The slabbings of leaves on the ground signaled the arrival of autumn.
